short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sets the user's new tab location to 24HourHomepage.com

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
There are 86,400 seconds in a day.
For every UTC second of the day, you will see one clickable image. 
Repeating every day.
Forever.

Find fun content or publish your own at https://24HourHomepage.com
